text: Elections were held in Prescott and Russell United Counties, Ontario on October 22, 2018 in conjunction with municipal elections across the province. ==Prescott and Russell United Counties Council== The Council consists of the mayors of the eight constituent municipalities:http://www.prescott- russell.on.ca/en/council-members {| class="wikitable" !
